item.title: WATCH: Inauguration moments then and now

item.title: WATCH: Dog saved in icy river rescue
item.description: Chris MacRitchie plunged himself into a frozen river in Vermont after realizing a dog had fallen through the ice.

item.title: Trump inauguration live updates: Trump brings in record $250 million in fundraising
item.description: There's a full slate of activities this weekend ahead of Monday's swearing-in ceremonies.

item.title: Over 18,000 Costco employees voted to approve nationwide strike
item.description: The Teamsters union released the results of the strike vote on Sunday evening.

item.title: 90 Palestinian prisoners released from Israel
item.description: The ceasefire began Sunday after Hamas supplied a list of the hostages slated for return to Israel.
